5)2 do 16
0010 - 2
1001 - 9
1110 - E
11111101 - FD
0000101000000000 - A00
01011010001110010000001011010100 - 5A3902D4
110000001111111111101110 - 303FFBA


8)16 do 10

25 - 37
1C - 28
FF - 255
1423 - 5155
0200 - 512
1000 - 4096
FFFE - 65534
FFF0 - 65520
00010000 = 65536
FFFFFFF = 2^32 = +- 4000000000

9)
   11101010
OR 10110001
------------
   11111011

    11101010
AND 10110001
------------
    10100000

    11101010
XOR 10110001
------------
    01011011
